parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort returned entries. Valid values:

*   DESC: Returned entries are sorted in descending order. If this parameter is left empty, returned entries are sorted in descending order by default.
*   ASC: Returned entries are sorted in ascending order.

parameters.name: DomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC (default): hosted public domain name
*   CACHE: cached public domain name

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

Default value: en

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The method that is used to sort returned entries. Valid values:

*   createDate: sorts returned entries by creation time. If this parameter is left empty, returned entries are sorted by creation time by default.
*   expireDate: sorts returned entries by expiration time.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: VersionCode
parameters.description: The version code of the Alibaba Cloud DNS instance.
